settings.title: Build Your Own Vday Card
settings.text: All we need is a good image of your furry friend and we can turn it into a masterpiece. Get your pet turned into something memorable that will last forever!

settings.title: A Card For every Occasion
settings.text: Build your own card for any occassion, Wedding, Anniversary, even Birthday's click below to get started.

settings.title: Customize Everything!
settings.text: You can customize the entire card. Each element can be used to show a different trait of your best friend. If you can't think of something leave it up to us!

settings.title: Choose Your Product
settings.text: We have different products that you can have your PokePet displayed on!

settings.title: CREATE CUSTOM CARDS FOR THE PErFEct GIFt
